wikipedia_page.main: George Willoughby Moke Norrie, 2nd Baron Norrie (born 27 April 1936) is a British peer and environmentalist. He piloted important legislation on national parks and statutory swimming to promote water safety for school age children. He has a long track record as a champion of the environmental voluntary sector.
